product_description.title: Samba OG Shoes
product_description.text: Long before the adidas Samba shoes took to the streets, they lived for the indoor football pitch. Their smooth leather upper and reinforced rubber gum sole were designed with agility and control in mind. Though times have changed, their essence remains. Today, they carry on the legacy as an iconic street style, ready for whatever your day brings. Molded into their design is decades of history, keeping the spirit of the Trefoil alive.
product_description.subtitle: Sport-inspired shoes with a retro look, modern comfort and a rich past.
